data.text: @StJohnsTelegram Don’t let the facts get in the way of stoking fear https://t.co/rzCcqbJiXQ

@StJohnsTelegram This is truly unbelievable - just stop it
Think about those who’ve been living alone, out of business, living in domestic abuse, no school breakfast program etc. Should I lecture people on their health b/c they clog the system. Pure ignorance
@StJohnsTelegram They're in luck since it's been overblown
